text:
iOS app to edit .txt files (w/ Dropbox sync) that preserves Windows-style line breaks

I commonly edit .txt files on my PC (Notepad) and my Mac (using TextEdit) and
store them in Dropbox. I would like also like to be able to edit these .txt
files on my iOS devices. Every app that I've tried breaks the Windows-style
line breaks; if I edit a .txt file, all line breaks are lost when I open that
file in Notepad.

Is there any iOS app which can edit .txt files and preserve Windows-style line
breaks? (Paid is OK, but cheaper is better.) I have tried iA Writer and Write
2.
